name: IgOS
short_description: IgOS is an operating system introducing a set of new OS paradigms. It is fully object orientated on the user side, file-free, process-free and window-free. Enjoy a brand new computer feeling!

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: Common Public License 1.0
